meanings.definition: The state of being immortal or never dying.
meanings.sent1: Legends speak of the deathlessness of the ancient gods.
meanings.sent2: The belief in deathlessness is a common theme in many religions.
meanings.sent3: In the fairy tale, the princess achieved deathlessness by drinking a magical potion.
meanings.sent4: The old tree in the garden seemed to possess a sense of deathlessness, standing tall for centuries.
meanings.sent5: The vampire's curse granted him the gift of deathlessness, but at a great cost.

meanings.definition: The quality of being eternal or everlasting.
meanings.sent1: The beauty of the sunset filled her heart with a sense of deathlessness.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins stood as a testament to the deathlessness of time.
meanings.sent3: The artist captured the essence of deathlessness in his painting of the starry night sky.
meanings.sent4: The bond between the two friends seemed to have a sense of deathlessness, enduring all trials.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song carried a feeling of deathlessness, echoing through the ages.
